pr_title: HDFS-15202 Boost short circuit cache (rebase PR-1884)

timeline.message: Added parameter dfs.client.short.circuit.num improving HDFS-client's massive reading performance by create few instances ShortCircuit caches instead of one. It helps avoid locks and lets CPU do job.

timeline.bodyText: A lot of test code changes are not needed if you add an overriding method runBlockReaderLocalTest(BlockReaderLocalTest test, boolean checksum, long readahead) that calls runBlockReaderLocalTest(test, checksum, readahead, 1);
timeline.author: jojochuang

replies.bodyText: Thank you, I fixed it. But below by link writes "Could not update commit status". Should I create new PR or it is enough?
replies.author: pustota2009

timeline.message:
